li.text: Before connecting and disconnecting test objects, verify that all outputs have been turned off. Never connect or disconnect a test object while the outputs are active.

li.text: All sockets on the front panel are to be considered dangerous with working voltages up to or great 300 Vrms . Only use cables that meet these respective requirements to connect to the equipment.
